about_the_game:
Welcome to Echoes of the Past

Where the past comes alive, and fears take shape. You are a night guard in a psychiatric hospital, where a seemingly ordinary shift turns into a fight for survival. A threatening creature emerges from the darkness, and your only chance is to hide or outsmart it to survive the night. To make it through, you must endure until dawn, using your wits, limited resources, and the environment to stay one step ahead of the lurking horror. Every action you take matters, and the slightest mistake could cost you your life. Will you endure the onslaught of terror and uncover the secrets of this grim place?

KEY FEATURES

1. Dynamic Lighting and Fearful Atmosphere
Your safety relies on light, but it won't last forever. Power outages and flickering lamps will make your survival even more challenging. The light can go out on its own, requiring you to restore it manually. Beware: the monster can also disable the lights, plunging you into darkness at the worst possible moment. Use your light sources wisely to stay hidden, but never trust the shadows.

2. Surveillance Cameras – Your Primary Tool
Track the monster's movements through a network of cameras. Plan your actions carefully using the information provided, but be careful – spending too much time at the monitor makes you vulnerable. Additionally, some cameras may emit noises, attracting the monster’s attention. This adds a new layer of strategy: choose your monitoring tools wisely, as they can either save you or lead the creature straight to you.

3. Liminal Spaces and Unnerving Design
Explore liminal spaces that evoke a haunting sense of unease and nostalgia. The hospital’s endless hallways, eerie silence, and surreal design blur the lines between reality and nightmare, immersing you in an unsettling world that feels both familiar and alien.

4. Intense and Suspenseful Gameplay
Can you survive the night in this horrifying place? Use your equipment wisely, or this will be your last shift. Every sound, every flicker of light, and every movement could mean life or death. The tension builds with every passing moment as the horrors close in.

Why Play Echoes of the Past?

  • Thrilling gameplay that keeps you on edge until the very end.

  • Immersive visual and sound design that enhances the horror experience.

  • Interactive elements to engage with your surroundings.

  • A constant feeling of vulnerability and fear amplified by the disturbing atmosphere of liminal spaces.

Face your fears, survive the night, and uncover the truth hidden in the shadows of Echoes of the Past.
